## Downstream impact checklist

If this PR changes chapter text, check any companion resources that need updating:

- [ ] **Vocabulary cards** — terms added, removed, or redefined
- [ ] **Quizzes** — questions referencing changed content
- [ ] **Slideshows** — slides covering revised sections
- [ ] **Primary sources** — source selections or context affected
- [ ] **Pacing guide** — timing or scope changed
- [ ] **Standards alignment** — coverage of a standard affected
- [ ] **Timeline** — dates or events added or removed
- [ ] **Graphic organizers** — structure or categories changed
- [ ] **Cornell notes** — key topics or questions affected
- [ ] **Search index** — rebuilt with `bash scripts/build_search_index.sh`
- [ ] **N/A** — this PR does not change chapter content
